name: Reflex Unit 2
description:
For Oculus Quest

The year is 2039 and the planet has recovered after the events of Reflex Unit 1. Life seems safe, until a new larger army of remote control drones suddenly attacks strategic cities around the globe. 

It is up to you again to pilot a new batch of experimental hardware to fight back the invading forces and save the planet, and beyond...

- 1 or 2 Player Campaign
- 2 to 4 Player Death Match and Survival modes
- Cross Platform Multiplayer

This product is compatible with Oculus Quest only. For other platforms, please purchase from the links below. SideQuest is recommended for simple Oculus Quest installation.

Android : Google Play Store
iOS : Apple App Store
Oculus GO : Oculus Store 
Oculus Rift : Oculus Store
